extract_file_data.description: Upload a file and immediately receive extracted content

props.name: file
props.description: The file to upload for extraction. Supported: PDF, images (JPEG, PNG, TIFF, BMP), Word docs (DOC, DOCX), text files (TXT)

props.name: name
props.description: A descriptive name for the extraction

props.name: language
props.description: Document's language for accurate extraction. Extracta.ai supports multiple languages with advanced AI algorithms designed to parse linguistic nuances.

props.name: fields
props.description: Define the data fields you want to extract from documents

props.name: key
props.description: Unique identifier for this field (e.g., "name", "email")

props.name: type
props.description: Type of data to extract

props.name: description
props.description: Describe what this field represents

props.name: example
props.description: Sample value to help the AI understand the expected format

props.name: objectProperties
props.description: For object types: Define nested fields as an array. Example: [{"key":"name","type":"string","description":"Full name","example":"John Doe"}]

props.name: arrayItemProperties
props.description: For array of objects: Define the structure of each array item as an array. Example: [{"key":"company","type":"string","description":"Company name","example":"Tech Corp"}]

props.name: description
props.description: A description for the extraction

props.name: hasTable
props.description: Whether the document contains tables

props.name: hasVisuals
props.description: Whether the document contains charts, graphs, or diagrams

props.name: handwrittenTextRecognition
props.description: Whether to recognize handwritten text

props.name: checkboxRecognition
props.description: Whether to recognize checkboxes and their states

props.name: longDocument
props.description: Enable for very large or complex documents

props.name: splitPdfPages
props.description: Treat each PDF page as a separate extraction unit

props.name: specificPageProcessing
props.description: Extract only a specified range of pages

props.name: pageFrom
props.description: Starting page number (required if Specific Page Processing is enabled)

props.name: pageTo
props.description: Ending page number (required if Specific Page Processing is enabled)

get_extraction_results.description: Fetches successful data from extraction. Note: The API recommends a 2-second delay between requests to avoid rate-limiting.

props.name: extractionId
props.description: The ID of the extraction

props.name: batchId
props.description: The ID of the batch

props.name: fileId
props.description: The ID of the file (optional). If provided, filters results to only that file.

props.name: extractionId
props.description: Unique identifier for the extraction

props.name: file
props.description: Document file to upload (PDF, images, etc.)

props.name: batchId
props.description: The ID of the batch to add files to (optional). If not provided, a new batch will be created.

extraction_failed.description: Triggers when a document extraction fails.

new_document_processed.description: Triggers when a document extraction is successfully processed.
